languages.text: "Мутанты, приговоренные к казни, сорвались с цепей и набросились на горожан... давненько такого не было, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Словно почуяли, что день особенный..." {n}Палач кривит губы, рассеченные в свалке.{/n} "Комендант отвечает за виновных. Недоглядел".

traits.locale_text: "Не имею понятия, Ваше Сиятельство! Впервые такое. И этот щемящий ужас... Он захватил меня, еще когда я спускался на подъемнике. Безусловно, я и так пребываю в ужасе от происходящего — но то ощущение было... странным... я бы даже сказал, потусторонним! Счастье, что все прошло — и вы живы, Ваше Сиятельство!"

languages.text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."
languages.original_text: "Мутанты, приговоренные к казни, сорвались с цепей и набросились на горожан... давненько такого не было, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Словно почуяли, что день особенный..." {n}Палач кривит губы, рассеченные в свалке.{/n} "Комендант отвечает за виновных. Недоглядел".

traits.locale_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

"The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

"I have no idea, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Nothing of the sort has ever happened before. And that prickling terror... It seized me as I was coming down in the elevator. As if I wasn't terrified enough already, but that feeling was... strange... I'd even say otherworldly! I'm glad it's all over — and that you're alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

"The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

"The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

languages.text: “那些被判了死刑的变种人越狱了，袭击了镇上的居民……这种事情已经很久很久都没发生过了，来自上界的大人。他们肯定意识到，今天是个特别的日子……”{n}刽子手的嘴唇卷曲着，在打斗过程中被人一拳打裂。{/n}“负责看守他们的人是指挥官，他太掉以轻心了。”
languages.original_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

traits.locale_text: “那些被判了死刑的变种人越狱了，袭击了镇上的居民……这种事情已经很久很久都没发生过了，来自上界的大人。他们肯定意识到，今天是个特别的日子……”{/n}刽子手的嘴唇卷曲着，在打斗过程中被人一拳打裂。{n}“负责看守他们的人是指挥官，他太掉以轻心了。”

languages.text: «Los malditos mutantes se escaparon y atacaron a los lugareños... Hacía muchísimo tiempo que no ocurría nada parecido, Excelencia Celestial. Deben de haberse olido que hoy es un día especial...». {n}El verdugo tuerce el gesto, con el labio partido por un golpe recibido durante el combate.{/n} «El comandante tenía el deber de vigilarlos. Un deber que ha descuidado».
languages.original_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

traits.locale_text: «Los malditos mutantes se escaparon y atacaron a los lugareños... Hacía muchísimo tiempo que no ocurría nada parecido, Excelencia Celestial. Deben de haberse olido que hoy es un día especial...». {n}El verdugo tuerce el gesto, con el labio partido por un golpe recibido durante el combate.{/n} «El comandante tenía el deber de vigilarlos. Un deber que ha descuidado».

languages.text: "Mahkûm edilen mutantlar serbest kaldı ve kasaba halkına saldırdı... Böyle bir şeyin olmasından bu yana çok, çok uzun zaman geçti Semavi Efendimiz. Bugünün özel bir gün olduğunu anlamış olmalılar..." {n}Celladın dudağı, çatışmada aldığı bir darbeyle yarılmış hâlde bükülüyor.{/n} "Onları korumaktan komutan sorumluydu. Dikkatsizlik etti."
languages.original_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

traits.locale_text: "Mahkûm edilen mutantlar serbest kaldı ve kasaba halkına saldırdı... Böyle bir şeyin olmasından bu yana çok, çok uzun zaman geçti Semavi Efendimiz. Bugünün özel bir gün olduğunu anlamış olmalılar..." {n}Celladın dudağı, çatışmada aldığı bir darbeyle yarılmış hâlde bükülüyor.{/n} "Onları korumaktan komutan sorumluydu. Dikkatsizlik etti."

languages.text: 「有罪を宣告された変異体が逃げだし、町の住民を攻撃した…こんなことが起こったのはもう随分昔のことですよ、天の閣下。彼らは、今日が特別な日であるということに気づかなければなりませんでした…」{n}処刑人の唇はゆがみ、けんかでの一撃で裂けていた。{/n}「司令官はそれらを防止する責任がありました。彼は不注意でした」
languages.original_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

traits.locale_text: 「有罪を宣告された変異体が逃げだし、町の住民を攻撃した…こんなことが起こったのはもう随分昔のことですよ、天の閣下。彼らは、今日が特別な日であるということに気づかなければなりませんでした…」{n}処刑人の唇はゆがみ、けんかでの一撃で裂けていた。{/n}「司令官はそれらを防止する責任がありました。彼は不注意でした」

languages.text: « Les mutants condamnés se sont échappés et ont attaqué les habitants... Cela faisait très longtemps qu'un tel incident ne s'était pas produit, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Ils ont dû deviner que ce jour était une occasion spéciale... » {n}Les lèvres du bourreau, fendues au cours de l'escarmouche, se retroussent avec mépris.{/n} « Le commandant était chargé de les surveiller, mais visiblement, il a manqué à son devoir. »
languages.original_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."

traits.locale_text: « Les mutants condamnés se sont échappés et ont attaqué les habitants... Cela faisait très longtemps qu'un tel incident ne s'était pas produit, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Ils ont dû deviner que ce jour était une occasion spéciale... » {n}Les lèvres du bourreau, fendues au cours de l'escarmouche, se retroussent avec mépris.{/n} « Le commandant était chargé de les surveiller, mais visiblement, il a manqué à son devoir. »

languages.text: "Die verurteilten Mutanten haben sich befreit und die Bürger angegriffen ... So etwas ist schon sehr, sehr lange nicht mehr passiert, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Sie haben wohl bemerkt, dass heute ein besonderer Tag ist ..." {n}Der Henker schürzt seine von einem Schlag aufgeplatzten Lippen.{/n} "Der Kommandant war für ihre Bewachung zuständig. Er ist unvorsichtig geworden."
languages.original_text: "The condemned mutants broke loose and attacked the townsfolk... It has been a long, long time since anything like that happened, Your Celestial Highness. They must have sniffed out that today is a special day..." {n}The executioner's lip curls, split by a blow during the fight.{/n} "The commander was responsible for guarding them. He got careless."
